content: for row 9 written out a bit more clearly ** **row 9 rs ** knit 3 sts slip the marker yarn over once k2tog twelve times in a row yo k1 21 times yarn over once ssk twelve times in a row yarn over once slip the marker and knit the last 3 sts **written out even further it would look something like this ** k2tog k2tog k2tog k2tog k2tog k2tog k2tog k2tog k2tog k2tog k2tog k2tog yo k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo ssk ssk ssk ssk ssk ssk ssk ssk ssk ssk ssk ssk i hope that helps please email me at christineparkerco@gmail com if you have additional questions --- i love seeing your finished projects please share on social media using hashtags **#clevelandshaleshawl** and **#christineparkerco** and tag me ** @christineparkerco 3 ** on instagram so i can see & share it 1 https //aroundthetableyarns com/ 2 https //www yarndiscoverytour com/ 3 https //www instagram com/christineparkerco/
